item.title: A few thoughts on R packages
item.description: Jonas Geschke, Ignasi Bartomeus and I have recently released rcites v-1.0.0 on CRAN, a R client for the Species+ API after it has been reviewed by rOpenSci. In this post, I would like to share this recent experience as well as several valuable resources. What is an R package? In the introduction of his book R packages, Hadley Wickham wrote: A package bundles together code, data, documentation, and tests, and is easy to share with others.
